issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: NameNodeMXBean#getNNStarted()  metric is deprecated in branch-2 and removed from trunk.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
HDFS-8388 added one new metric {{NNStartedTimeInMillis}} to get NN start time in milliseconds.

Now based on [~wheat9] and [~ajisakaa] suggestions now we should deprecate {{NameNodeMXBean#getNNStarted}} in branch2 and remove from trunk.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-8388?focusedCommentId=14709614&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-14709614

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-8388?focusedCommentId=14726746&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-14726746
fields.summary: Deprecate NameNodeMXBean#getNNStarted in branch2 and remove from trunk
